elements.text:
You and your partner both have strong opinions and you don't always agree with each other. Over dinner one evening, you get into a heated argument about a topic that is a passion of yours.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I want to yell at my partner, but I take a few minutes to calm down before returning to the conversation.
I threaten to break up with my partner if they don't agree with me.
I explain my views calmly and clearly.
I want to lock myself in my room, but decide that avoiding my partner won't be helpful in the long run.
I try to see things from my partner's perspective to understand where they are coming from.
